participant_1.name: Tom
participant_1.personality: Slightly melancholic and introverted, often reflecting on past choices.
participant_1.background: i work at a nursing home. i am overweight and unhappy. my wife left me and took my children. i spend most of my time on facebook when i am not working. i don't believe in god.

participant_2.name: Linda
participant_2.personality: Warm-hearted and empathetic, with a strong sense of community.
participant_2.background: i volunteer at a soup kitchen. i like watching war documentaries. i was poor growing up. i'm a retired gym teacher. cheeseburgers are my favorite food.
